text: Kyle Alessandro Helgesen Villalobos (born 10 March 2006), known by his stage name Kyle Alessandro, is a Norwegian singer and songwriter. He represented Norway at the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 with the song "Lighter", where he finished 18th with 88 points. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Title Details Første kapittel * Released: 1 January 2017 * Label: Compro * Formats: Digital download, streaming Evig & alltid * Released: 13 January 2023 * Label: Self-released * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Singles=== ====As lead artist==== Title Year Peak chart positions Album NOR AUT FIN GER LTU NL SWE SWI UK Down.
